      • Configuration

        public Configuration(java.lang.String path,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> items)
        Constructs configuration from supplied items.
        Parameters:
        items - Map with keys and values giving fields in shape "name": "value" in JSON file.

    • Method Detail

      • addChangeListener

        public void addChangeListener(ConfigurationChangeListener l)
        Adds the listener that will be alerted on configuration change.
        Parameters:
        l - Listener that should be added to waiting list.

      • removeChangeListener

        public boolean removeChangeListener(ConfigurationChangeListener l)
        Removes the specified listener from waiting list of objects that are waiting for configuration change.
        Parameters:
        l - Listener that should be removed.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the listener was successfully removed.

      • save

        Saves configuration to file.
        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • getItem

        public java.lang.String getItem(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - name of the field which value we want to know
        Returns:
        value of the field with given name, null if not found

      • getConfigValue

        public java.lang.String getConfigValue(java.lang.String name)
        Method for classes that implement configuration fields. This method should return the value associated with given field name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the field whose value you want to retrive.
        Returns:
        Returns the value associated with given field or null.

      • getConfigItem

        public CItem getConfigItem(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the whole config item associated with given name or null.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the field.
        Returns:
        Returns the item associated with given name.

      • setConfigItem

        public void setConfigItem(java.lang.String name,
                          CItem value)
        Sets configuration item on given field.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the item.
        value - The item that should be stored.

      • setConfigValue

        public void setConfigValue(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String value)
        Sets the value inside configuration field with given name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the configuration field.
        value - Its new value.

      • getConfiguration

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CItem> getConfiguration()
        Returns map that stores the configuration of this bot,
        Returns:
        Configuration map. (keys and values as in JSON specified in "configuration": [..])

      • onChange

        public void onChange()
        Should be called after there was a change in the configuration fields.
        This method allerts all the listeners that there was a change in configuration.
